item.title: Brown University shooting suspect found dead, also killed MIT professor, officials say
item.description: The Brown University shooting suspect was found dead in a storage unit in Salem, New Hampshire. Authorities believe he is also responsible for killing...

item.title: Cartel leader accused of faking his death gets 11 years in U.S. prison
item.description: Gutierrez-Ochoa is the son-in-law of El Mencho, the leader of the notorious Jalisco New Generation cartel,

item.title: Australia announces gun buyback plan just days after Bondi Beach attack
item.description: Australia will use a sweeping buyback scheme to "get guns off our streets," Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Friday.

item.title: Serial killer gets death sentence for string of murders in Phoenix
item.description: Cleophus Cooksey Jr., 43, was found guilty in late September of murder in eight killings.

item.title: Tipster using Reddit was key in cracking Brown University shooting case, police say
item.description: Information from a tipster who posted on Reddit about a strange encounter with another man was key in cracking the Brown University and MIT shootings ...
